mapper.select: SELECT c."coursecode" as courseCode, c."coursename" AS courseName, c."category" AS category, c."professorid" AS professorId FROM public."course" c WHERE c."coursecode"=#{courseCode}
SELECT c."coursecode" as courseCode, c."coursename" AS courseName, c."category" AS category FROM public."course" c WHERE c."coursename"=#{courseName}

SELECT c."coursecode" as courseCode, c."coursename" AS courseName, c."category" AS category, u."firstname" as prof_firstname, u."lastname" as prof_lastname, u."userid" as prof_userid FROM public."course" c INNER JOIN professor p ON p.professorid = c.professorId INNER JOIN public."user" u ON p.userid = u.userid

SELECT c."coursecode" as courseCode, c."coursename" AS courseName, c."category" AS category, u."firstname" as prof_firstname, u."lastname" as prof_lastname, u."userid" as prof_userid FROM public."course" c INNER JOIN professor p ON c.professorid = p.professorid INNER JOIN public."user" u ON p.userid = u.userid INNER JOIN enrollment e ON c.coursecode = e.coursecode INNER JOIN student s ON e.studentid = s.studentid WHERE s."studentid" = #{studentId}

SELECT c."coursecode" AS courseCode, c."coursename" AS courseName, c."starttime" AS startTime, c."endtime" AS endTime, u."firstname" as prof_firstname, u."lastname" as prof_lastname, u."userid" as prof_userid FROM public."course" c INNER JOIN professor p ON c.professorid = p.professorId INNER JOIN public."user" u ON p.userid = u.userid INNER JOIN enrollment e ON c.coursecode = e.coursecode INNER JOIN student s ON e.studentid = s.studentid WHERE s."studentid" = #{studentId}
SELECT c."coursecode" as courseCode, c."coursename" AS courseName, c."category" AS category, c."starttime" as startTime, c."endtime" as endTime FROM public."course" c

SELECT c."coursecode" AS courseCode, c."coursename" AS courseName, c."category" AS category FROM public."course" c INNER JOIN professor p ON c.professorid = p.professorid WHERE p."professorid" = #{professorId}
